features: ACNE-PRONE FACE WASH - This facial cleanser instantly washes away blemish causing dirt, oil and pollution but not essential moisture
FACE CLEANSER FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Gently cleans sensitive skin without stripping, leaving your skin comfortable and smooth
INFUSED WITH EXTRACTS - This face cleanser is infused with extracts, like willow bark, which is known to clarify, and lavender, which is known to soothe skin and help even skin tone
QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Our face wash is dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic (won’t clog pores) and free of fragrance, parabens, dyes, SLS/SLES sulfates
VEGAN FRIENDLY FORMULA - Our Biore Gentle & Breathable Acne-Prone face cleanser is cruelty free and vegan friendly, so it’s not tested on animals and contains no animal derived ingredients
body.description: Breathable skin, we’re here for you. There’s serious cleaning and there’s gentle cleaning.This face wash is both. With a pore purifying blend including willow bark extract, Biore Gentle & Breathable facial wash for acne prone skin instantly washes away 2x more dirt, oil and pollution than a basic face cleanser but not essential moisture. So you’re clean faced and ready to go for it. Made with willow bark extract, our Biore Gentle & Breathable Facial Cleanser instantly filters out the gunk that can cause breakouts without stripping your skin. Your skin returns the favor with a comfy clean feel. This water-based face wash is non-comedogenic, which means it won’t clog pores. We included other extracts too, like eucalyptus, which is known to keep skin’s moisture intact, and lavender extract, known to soothe and help even skin tone. Our face wash doesn’t have any of the things you don’t want. It’s free of fragrance, parabens, dyes, SLS/SLES sulfates–and worry. This Biore facial cleanser is also vegan friendly because we’re committed to making products that are ethically and sustainably responsible. We are proud to be a carbon neutral brand–offsetting the carbon footprint of our face cleansers and supporting climate initiatives. How does it work? To use, wet your face, pump the face cleanser into your hands and work into a lather, then massage over your entire face before rinsing thoroughly with water. For optimal results, use up to two times daily. Here’s to a safe space for acne prone skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very gentle face cleanser, there is also no scent. I have not broken out using this. I love the gel and the bottle application. It's a great value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and gentle cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I have very oily skin and often will get small breakouts. I have been using this face wash as my daily cleanser and so far I have had good results. I’m not sure if it’s helped clear up my breakouts but I feel like I have had less show up to begin with which is great. The scent isn’t too noticeable and this feels light and gentle on my skin. I don’t feel like it’s dried my skin out at all and it leaves me feeling pretty clean. I like that it has a pump, it’s much easier to use than a tube. This is a good everyday cleanser for many different skin types.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for oily skin
reviews.reviewText: Works well on oily skin. Doesn’t dry out my face and leaves it feeling smooth, soft and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for a couple of weeks now and it has been noticeably shrinking my pores. I mostly use it in the shower, but quickly realized I need to just put it on one hand and then onto my face, and not rub it between my hands first or it gets too watered down. Using it at the sink I can rub it on both hands and then onto my face. When I used it at the sink I could tell it was drying. I put on a serum and lotion after it anyways though, so it isn't an issue for me. The ingredients do have a scent that isn't very good, but it is light and goes away quickly, so it's tolerable. I have tried out a Face Shop cleanser similar to this lately that also works well, and maybe a tad better even, but that other one smells so strongly that I think I prefer this one overall. Both are good though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This Biore acne prone cleanser is an unscented cleanser that seems gentle on the skin and cleans well. I don't break out too often so I am unsure of how well it works to prevent or clear acne. The only thing I did noticed is that it left my skin a little on the dry side. Overall it is a nice basic cleanser that would be good for teens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Scentless And Slight Lather
reviews.reviewText: I was my face everyday when I shower. I try and wash it in the morning too when I get the chance as my skin does tend to be more on the oily side recently. I enjoy having a clean and refreshing feeling in the morning and at night.Quality:This facial cleaner is pretty mild. It doesn't have a scent to it and it slightly lathers when you start to use it. I would say one pump is good enough for your whole face. No really need to go more than that. It's a good product to use daily without causing any damage to your skin especially if you're acne prone.Overall, very solid product that does a good job keep your face clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has a scent. It's kind of powdery and light but its there. This face wash is really gentle and doesn't have a ton of foam. For my needs, I feel like this is too gentle and doesn't get my skin clean enough. It's a good price if you are looking for something along the lines of cera ve foaming cleanser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My skin is sensitive and I had no issue with this face wash
